name: Flipping out
description:
The game was created in 3 days for BenBonk Game Jam #3.

You are playing for a coin. The first side can move horizontally, and the second side can move vertically.

Controls

WASD - movement

SPACE - change side

R - restart

Credits

kittyfelineeee - music (https://soundcloud.com/user-218582931)

MYline media - programmer/game designer

the davestroyer - artist/level designer(https://game-dav.itch.io/)
